### Load packages

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

### Load data

```{r load-data, message=FALSE}
my_gm <- gapminder
```

```{r gdp-lifeExp-canvas, message = FALSE}
my_gm %>% 
  filter(year == "2007",
         continent != "Oceania") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  scale_x_log10() + 
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ continent)
```

```{r}
p <- my_gm %>% 
  filter(year == "2007",
         continent != "Oceania") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  scale_x_log10() + 
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ continent)

p + labs(title = "test title")
```
